title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4122.25 - Refunds and exchanges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4122.25 - Refunds and exchanges

State Regulations

Whenever a horse is scratched or declared a nonstarter, and a refund is required under these rules, the tickets previously issued
designating such horse shall be refunded or, at the option of the holder, may
be exchanged for another selection of the same denomination in the same pool
provided the track has an operating facility for such an exchange and
conditions and circumstances, including available time remaining before the
start, make an exchange feasible in the judgment of management. Refunds and
exchanges shall be made at locations designated for the purposes by management
and convenient for the public. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4122.25

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
